sen.j: 象引（ぞうひき）は、歌舞伎の演目の一つ。
sen.e: Zohiki (Pulling the Elephant) is a kabuki play.
Zohiki (Pulling the Elephant) is a kabuki play.
Zohiki (Pulling the Elephant) is a kabuki play.

sen.j: また、歌舞伎十八番の一つ。
sen.e: It is one of the eighteen best kabuki plays.
It is one of the eighteen best kabuki plays.
It is one of the eighteen best kabuki plays.

sen.j: 元禄14年(1701年)、江戸中村座で市川團十郎 (初代)が初演（『傾城王昭君』の一幕）。
sen.e: It was premiered in 1701 by Danjuro ICHIKAWA (I) at Edo-Nakamura-za Theatre (as part of "Keisei Oshokun" (The Courtesan Wang Zhaojun).
It was premiered in 1701 by Danjuro ICHIKAWA (I) at Edo-Nakamura-za Theatre (as part of "Keisei Oshokun" (The Courtesan Wang Zhaojun).
It was premiered in 1701 by Danjuro ICHIKAWA (I) at Edo-Nakamura-za Theatre (as part of "Keisei Oshokun" (The Courtesan Wang Zhaojun).

sen.j: 叛臣蘇我入鹿が連れてきたゾウを、藤原鎌足の家来山上源内左衛門が引きあってついに奪いとる、という粗筋。
sen.e: It recounts how Gennaizaemon YAMAGAMI, a retainer of FUJIWARA no Kamatari, wrests the elephant SOGA no Iruka the rebel has brought away from him.
It recounts how Gennaizaemon YAMAGAMI, a retainer of FUJIWARA no Kamatari, wrests the elephant SOGA no Iruka the rebel has brought away from him.
It recounts how Gennaizaemon YAMAGAMI, a retainer of FUJIWARA no Kamatari, wrests the elephant SOGA no Iruka the rebel has brought away from him.

sen.j: 源内左衛門の怪力を描いて、典型的な荒事の芸である。
sen.e: Depicting Gennaizaemon's supernatural strength, it is a typical art of aragoto (heroic play).
Depicting Gennaizaemon's supernatural strength, it is a typical art of aragoto (heroic play).
Depicting Gennaizaemon's supernatural strength, it is a typical art of aragoto (heroic play).

sen.j: 蘇我入鹿と山上源内左衛門の設定が、大臣・大伴褐麿と箕田源二猛になる場合がある。
sen.e: SOGA no Iruka and Gennaizaemon YAMAGAMI may become the Minister OTOMO no Kachimaro and MITA no Genjitakeru.
SOGA no Iruka and Gennaizaemon YAMAGAMI may become the Minister OTOMO no Kachimaro and MITA no Genjitakeru.
SOGA no Iruka and Gennaizaemon YAMAGAMI may become the Minister OTOMO no Kachimaro and MITA no Genjitakeru.

sen.j: 長らく上演が絶えていたが、1913年に市川左團次 (2代目)（平木白星作）、1933年に市川三升 (5代目)（山崎紫紅作）、1958年に前進座（平田兼三郎作）、1982年に尾上松緑 (2代目)（利倉幸一作）が復活上演している。
sen.e: Though the play was long out of performance, it was revived in 1913 by Sadanji ICHIKAWA (II) (written by Hakusei HIRAKI), in 1933 by Sansho ICHIKAWA (V) (written by Shiko YAMAZAKI), in 1958 by Zenshin-za Troupe (written by Kanesaburo HIRATA) and in 1982 by Shoroku ONOE (II) (written by Koichi TOSHIKURA).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Though the play was long out of performance, it was revived in 1913 by Sadanji ICHIKAWA (II) (written by Hakusei HIRAKI), in 1933 by Sansho ICHIKAWA (V) (written by Shiko YAMAZAKI), in 1958 by Zenshin-za Troupe (written by Kanesaburo HIRATA) and in 1982 by Shoroku ONOE (II) (written by Koichi TOSHIKURA).

Though the play was long out of performance, it was revived in 1913 by Sadanji ICHIKAWA (II) (written by Hakusei HIRAKI), in 1933 by Sansho ICHIKAWA (V) (written by Shiko YAMAZAKI), in 1958 by Zenshin-za Troupe (written by Kanesaburo HIRATA) and in 1982 by Shoroku ONOE (II) (written by Koichi TOSHIKURA).

sen.j: 現在では松緑版が中村富十郎 (5代目)などに引継がれている。
sen.e: The Shoroku version is now performed by Tomijuro NAKAMURA (V) and others.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The Shoroku version is now performed by Tomijuro NAKAMURA (V) and by others.
sen.cmt: and others より and by others の方が自然です。
sen.e: The Shoroku version is now performed by Tomijuro NAKAMURA (V) and by others.
